summary: This is a re-texture you need original mod by goldiocks . I saw this armor and thought it would look great on my character . It will make a fashion statement in Solitude .
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at at something like this so here it goes . You need original mod from author goldiocks  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56898/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56898  [/url]

  08/17/2014  Dark edition has been added same applies as previous retex  .


    This is all in all a beautiful armor to help add to  hdt  supported armors out there  . Once I got permission I asked friend to see if he would like to convert it to his body the 7bunp it just seemed to be the perfect hard soft combination . I am releasing the retex for those that have original and want flavor it was originally only going to be released with conversion . Goldiocks is looking forward to the release of texture so without further waiting here it is .

This works in mod organizer  so if all else fails just copy dds. files  to the original texture dds. files

      As this being a retex the same applies as the original  "no panties" . To add to this the color change has made the skirt a little more transparent .
author: cald123        Original mod goldiocks
